plot: A romantic bandit named Alvarez, wanted for raids on the mining camps of the California gold rush in 1849, is reformed by the love of a good woman.
title: Días rojos
plot_es: A romantic bandit named Alvarez, wanted for raids on the mining camps of the California gold rush in 1849, is reformed by the love of a good woman.
plot_en: A romantic bandit named Alvarez, wanted for raids on the mining camps of the California gold rush in 1849, is reformed by the love of a good woman.

cast.role: Mrs. Nell Winters aka Rosie Nell
cast.name: Eugenie Besserer

cast.role: King Bagley aka Knight of the Black Stain
cast.name: Walter Long
